item.title: The hex counter
item.description: 0x1FFD I understand that society created the construct of time to facilitate collaboration and create accountable systems. But…, it can be easy to lose a sense of your personal time as you continue working towards a particular goal. I do not like the idea of relying on alarms and calendars all the time to keep track of my progress all that I choose to pursue. So…, I’m continuing a practice that I practiced for a short while during the last summer.
